column4: hi, i have a small problem. when trying to rebuild the kernel, while in the process, i encounter this problem: http://pastebin.com/d6c6ebf65
as a result i can't boot because the sata driver won't load
how did you rebuild your kernel?
well im using arch, but the userbase is really small, i always have a tough time getting support from them
well for me rebuilding is not compiling
well since it's a new kernel, it has new "numbers", and your modules are located inside a directory with a different name
maybe you can try verifying a match of the location of your modules and the kernel's version
hmm, well i'm doing this all from the directory i untarred the original kernel to
and you are sure, that your kernel is pointing to the correct directory?
i dont see a reason why it wouldn't. im following the guide step by step and not doing anything with the old kernel
well that's all i can suggest now, if that doesn't help you, you may ask to another guy, sorry
i really don't know. just typing commands in the order i see them :P
maybe that's the problem you don't really understand that guide, i suggest you find what the commands are you typing are suppose to do
btw sorry for my english hehe, just learning xD
